/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars can be seen in the distance, hinting at the busy traffic typical of a major metropolitan area. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
